nile.description: Providing network independence through a very simple system; It was designed from the beginning to take care of itself, prevent threats, and improve productivity and convenience for customers.

rewaa.description: Rewaa enables you to track your inventory, sales, finance, and all selling offline and online, all through synced inventory and sales reports which come classified by period and branches, and Tax declaration reports.

nearpay.description: Payment Infrastructure As a Service Easily enable in-person NFC card payments within 30 minutes using the cutting-edge NearPay SDK.

celona.description: Celona offers a private 5G solution for enterprises; they simplify and automate the deployment of cellular wireless technology, empowering businesses with secure and reliable networks. Celona's expertise lies in delivering end-to-end solutions that seamlessly integrate with existing infrastructure.

northladder.description: NorthLadder is the #1 Trade-in platform across 10+ countries. It is a fast-growing digital platform that enables frictionless trade of used electronics.

cohere.description: Cohere empowers every developer and enterprise to build amazing products and capture true business value with language AI.
